meanings.definition: A person who revises or corrects written or printed material.
meanings.sent1: The reviser made sure all the spelling mistakes were fixed.
meanings.sent2: The reviser at the publishing company checked for any errors in the book.
meanings.sent3: The reviser found a funny typo that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She was like a detective, the reviser uncovering hidden errors in the text.
meanings.sent5: The reviser's job is like being a book doctor, making sure everything is healthy and well.

meanings.definition: To review, amend, or alter written or printed material for accuracy or improvement.
meanings.sent1: She will reviser the essay to make it better.
meanings.sent2: He reviser his resume before sending it out to potential employers.
meanings.sent3: I need to reviser this recipe because I forgot an ingredient.
meanings.sent4: The writer decided to reviser the ending of the story for a more satisfying conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The reviser carefully combed through the document, making sure every detail was just right.
